summary:
Download this mod if you want to challenge yourself and test the skills you have developed with your character against my 4th boss mod. Install simply by dropping the ESP file into your Skyrim data folder.
You will need Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
Dwarven Knight Wyn is a Dark Elf, obsessed with Dwarven technology and their history. He supposedly located the "Soul Gem of Mass Energy" he so desperately needs, but instead, what it lead him to is something completely different. On the road back home, he, his robots and knights have bumped into the dragonborn, and now it is a fight to the death. Blocking is imperative. Magic is useless. Allies are useless. Get struck by him once, you will die. Block his strike once, you survive. Make sure to carry as many healing potions with you as you can get, and stamina. Blocking is useless without stamina.

Check my other boss mods out:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69770/
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69802/
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69829/

Install simply by dropping the ESP file into your Skyrim data folder. The location of the boss will be show on the JPEG image in the archive. You will need Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
author: Vigland
